definition[0]: if two feelings, sounds, smells etc mingle, they mix together with each other
example[0]: Add the mint and allow the flavours to mingle.
example[1]: Her perfume mingled with the smell of wood smoke from the fire.
example[2]: Her excitement was mingled with a slight feeling of fear.
definition[1]: if you mingle at a party, you move around the room and talk to lots of different people
example[3]: She was eager to mingle with the other guests.
